content: Dogs seem to be getting smarter every year. I remember a farm dog long ago that tried to bite the tires of every pickup truck that drove past on the frontage road. Nowadays dogs never look up from their iPads. Yes, there's an occasional licking of their balls, but then it's back to the iPad.
